DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect oral Calcium Dobesilate oral Cabergoline prevention ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) high-risk woman underwent intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) .
DOC.brief_title: Calcium Dobesilate Versus Cabergoline Prevention Ovarian Hyperstimulation Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Two hundred twenty woman risk ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ICSI cycle randomly schedule two equal group . In group A , ( Calcium Dobesilate group ) , 1 cap / 8 h Doxium ( 500mg ) give day HCG injection 21 day ; group B ( Cabergoline group ) , 1 tab/day Cabergoline ( 0.5 mg ) give day HCG injection 8 day .
DOC.criteria: Patients enrol study infertile woman undergo ICSI one follow criterion : previous episode OHSS , polycystic ovary ( i.e. , > 24 antral follicle present baseline ultrasound examination ) , high AMH ( > 3.0 ng/mL ) , large number small follicle ( 8 12 mm ) see ultrasound ovarian stimulation , high s.E2 hCG trigger ( E2 > 3000 pg/ml rapidly rise s.E2 ) , presence > 20 follicle ultrasound day retrieval large number oocyte retrieve ( > 20 ) .
DOC.keyword: infertility ICSI OHSS Calcium Dobesilate Cabergoline
